Sharkpool: Terms and Conditions


Thank you for choosing Sharkpool for your lending and borrowing needs! Please not that Sharkpool is currently in Beta, and while fully functional, is not meant for a full release in its current state, as it is only meant to be a project that can meet the Apollo 11 criteria for Orbital 2019. Please feedback any bugs or suggestions to sharkpoolorbital2019@gmail.com.

The following terms and conditions apply:

  • Sharkpool is unable to access your passwords and personal credentials and will not distribute usage data
  • There is no official association between NUS and Sharkpool, with the exception of Sharkpool being a project for Orbital 2019.
  • Since this is, at its current state, intended as a project, Sharkpool does not have the resources to deal with disputes. In the unlikely case such a thing were to happen, please contact campus security.
  • Sharkpool does not bear any responsibility for the loss or damage of items lent.
